name: An Indie Adventure
description:
"THAT BELONGS IN A MUSEUM" James Indy shouted as he reached for the lost idol amidst a hail of bullets.

Traverse deadly jungle,  an ancient temple, and a mysterious holdout of the bad guys that got there first to claim the lost idol.

Controls:

W, D / arrows to move.

Space to jump.

S / down to fall though

Note: This was created for VimJam 2020, but unfortunately we weren't able to submit in time.
